author: santiagopg
msg: Change default policy for template inlining.

author: zongaro
msg: Work around problem with document('') function when transformation happens

author: zongaro
msg: After creating a new SAXImpl object, it should be passed to the translet's
prepassDocument method to give the translet a chance to extract information
from the document prior to transformation.

author: zongaro
msg: Code in lookupId was getting garbage _nodes from previous calls in the case
where argument was a whitespace-separated list of ID values.
